content:
# The insertion of 5 iron ore into the furnace was successful, and the inventory now reflects that I have 5 iron ore remaining.
# 
# The furnace should now resume its operation and continue smelting the iron ore into iron plates. This will help maintain the production flow of iron plates, which are essential for crafting further items.
# 
# I will monitor the furnace to ensure it continues to work and check the inventory for the produced iron plates.

# Waiting for the furnace to smelt the iron ore into plates.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum wait time of 30 seconds.
    plates = inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate]
    if plates >= 10:  # Checking if we have produced at least 10 iron plates.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an exception if smelting takes too long.

# After waiting, let's check the inventory for produced iron plates.
print(f"Inventory after smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Displaying updated inventory after smelting.
